column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Wish we would've had more mornings so we could've had more breakfasts here! Came across Wildberry while searching Yelp for breakfast places in Chicago
column2: their menu sounded good so we stopped in. No wait with a packed restaurant was a nice surprise. The waitress was nice
column3: the food was delicious! I got the classic eggs benedict
column4: my wife got a skillet with a side of their cinnamon roll pancakes. Next time we go
column5: I'm getting as many of those cinnamon roll pancakes as I can. All the food tasted great
column6: the atmosphere was nice and it'll definitely be our first breakfast stop next time we're in the city.
